title: 820-3942 shuts off when track pad plugged in
message:
Cleaned a little corrosion near thunderbolt ports and replaced corroded battery but all else looks okay.
Runs fine without trackpad cable plugged in, but once trackpad is plugged in it shuts down instantly or in a short amount of time. (tried new trackpad and cable)
Any ideas what to check first?
Many Thanks

title: 820-3942 shuts off when track pad plugged in
820-3942 shuts off when track pad plugged in
820-3942 shuts off when track pad plugged in
message: wow I really botched that number, sorry about that It's 820-4924

title: 820-3942 shuts off when track pad plugged in
message: Run internal diagnostic by holding down D key when turning on.

title: 820-3942 shuts off when track pad plugged in
message: Ran Internal Diagnostics...Came up with "There may be an issue with the power management system" Reference code PPN001.

title: 820-3942 shuts off when track pad plugged in
message: Inspect voltage/current sensors. U5400/10 and Q5480/90 also ISL6259 area. Must be corrosion somewhere.
